author: taylor
msg: Changed name of a local portlet app from PORTLET_APP to LOCAL

author: taylor
msg: Added Application Type to the MutablePortletApplication to support variants on the deployment of a portlet application. The default is to deploy as a web application. Im now exploring a second deployment type: deploying as a portlet application stored within the Jetspeed web application.
Note 1: remember to build and install this jar before building the portal project
Note 2: Im proposing refactoring the deploy tools: (Roger, are you reading this? ;-)
- move the code that actually creates the portlet applications into the running portal
- to deploy, simply drop a WAR file into a directory, and have a file scanner pickup it up in the portal

msg: Removing J1 PSML and Profiler services
